name: Welcome To The Resurrection (IGMC 2022 Entry)
description:
The year is 1939. You've been sentenced to a six month stint of work lease with the worst plantation in Florida. Will you survive the deadly secrets or succumb to madness and murder? What darkness lives within the hearts of those who would buy and sell men? Find out in this gripping, terror-filled tale of voodoo magic, cannibalistic corpses and a fate worse than death.

This game is a visual novel adventure with RPG elements. Your choices affect the outcome! Use your knowledge, fighting skills, desperation and luck to make it out unscathed.
